trans-unit.source: Defines <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: Definieert <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> criteria om onderdeel- of pakket niveau relaties te selecteren.

trans-unit.source: PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
trans-unit.target: PackageRelationshipSelector wordt gebruikt door de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>methode van de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager>-klasse moet een lijst opgeven van <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>onderdelen te worden ondertekend.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>

trans-unit.source: PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
trans-unit.target: PackageRelationshipSelector wordt gebruikt door de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>klasse voor het verkrijgen van een lijst met <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>onderdelen die zijn ondertekend met de opgegeven digitale handtekening.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> (`SourceUri`="/") that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: De [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] van de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> of de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> (`SourceUri`= '/') die eigenaar is van de relatie.

trans-unit.source: The type of the `selectionCriteria`, either by relationship <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or relationship <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Het type van de `selectionCriteria`, ofwel door relatie <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> of relatie <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the `selectorType`.
trans-unit.target: De kwalificatie-tekenreeks die wordt gebruikt om de relaties te selecteren op basis van de `selectorType`.

trans-unit.source: sourceUri or selectionCriteria is .
trans-unit.target: sourceUrior selectionCriteria is .

trans-unit.source: The selectorType parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: De selectorType parameter is niet geldig.

trans-unit.source: The selectorType parameter is but selectionCriteria is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: The selectorType parameter is but selectionCriteria is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The sourceUri is not the root ("/") and is also not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: The sourceUri is not the root ("/") and is also not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> objects that match the defined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri*>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*>, and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria*>.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert een lijst met <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> objecten die voldoen aan de gedefinieerde <> </> *>, <> </> *>, en <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria*>

trans-unit.source: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: Het pakket te selecteren op basis van de selectiecriteria van relaties.

trans-unit.source: A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Een lijst van relaties die overeenkomen met de selectieparameters opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selection criteria specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: De selectiecriteria voor het opgegeven opgehaald de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The selection criteria based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*> of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: De selectiecriteria op basis van de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*>van <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The selector type of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Het selectietype <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"> </xref> opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de basis-URI ('/') van het pakket of deel <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor als eigenaar van de relatie.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>

trans-unit.source: The root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Het pakket van de basis-URI ('/') of een deel <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>opgegeven voor de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor als eigenaar van de relatie.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>
